description:
In this course you will learn how to increase your search engine rankings, and have a full understanding of SEO and how it works. This course is designed for beginners looking to gain some visitors through search engine optimization

This course is perfect if you are a small business, or individual that doesn't want to hire a search engine optimization company. You will be able to achieve similar or better results on your own, with this course!

There is a series of videos in which we discuss the core fundamentals, everything you need to know to get started. We go on to do a full on site SEO package, for my latest website. This will ensure you full understanding.

I go into detail on every subject, to make sure you fully understand the concept and execution.
title: Complete guide to SEO. Learn successful SEO on real websites
